review_title: Growing pains exist and focus on the customer is back
pros:
- easyfundraising is a unique product that helps good causes raise vital funds for free. That's pretty special
- A recent re-organisation of the senior management team has brought back a distinct focus on what matters most, our customers.
- There are plenty of chances for people to own 'projects' and show their worth - if they are willing to grasp them
- I worked for many organisations and the benefits at easyfundraising are comparable and the location is pretty good too
cons:
- We are going through a transitional period as an organisation which means at times the direction isn't crystal clear 
- Legacy technology is a concern as it impacts customer and colleague experience 
- Communication is also lacking between teams and poor knowledge sharing at the grass-roots level slows us down
